title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
content: Current altcoin STAKING PER YEAR - Cosmos ATOM 10% - Zilliqa ZIL 13% - ICON ICX 10% - Band Protocol BAND 13% - Atomic Wallet Token AWC 20%. But it is not possible to exchange instantly to Bitcoin or other more popular altcoins. So it is just time waste. You can hold your Atomic wallet tokens in your wallet or exchange and nothing more, there are not interested buyers. Â P.S. I invested 0.01BTC in Tether USDT staking, it is something complete different, I always can exchange Tether USDT instantly to Bitcoin, ETH, Stelar, EOS, Ripple, Doge, TRON, Monero etc. PM for the link, if interested.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: Pezroly on December 25, 2022, 02:17:08 PMP.S. I invested 0.01BTC in Tether USDT staking, it is something complete different, I always can exchange Tether USDT instantly to Bitcoin, ETH, Stelar, EOS, Ripple, Doge, TRON, Monero etc. PM for the link, if interested.Here is where we draw the linkThe quoted part makes you sound like a complete scammer. Why would anyone PM you for a link. Why don't you post the link here, and we all see it?Also, the idea of staking is messed up. It's just a huge Ponzi scheme.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on December 27, 2022, 11:00:18 PMQuote from: Pezroly on December 25, 2022, 02:17:08 PMP.S. I invested 0.01BTC in Tether USDT staking, it is something complete different, I always can exchange Tether USDT instantly to Bitcoin, ETH, Stelar, EOS, Ripple, Doge, TRON, Monero etc. PM for the link, if interested.Here is where we draw the linkThe quoted part makes you sound like a complete scammer. Why would anyone PM you for a link. Why don't you post the link here, and we all see it?Also, the idea of staking is messed up. It's just a huge Ponzi scheme.He is obviously trying to push his referral link to people, and since it's against the bitcointalk rules to post those, so OP decided to go this way.But what you said about staking, i can see how staking usdt is unsustainable, but when staking is about securing the chain, it really doesn't differ from PoW in a way it would be more any more ponzi. And word Ponzi doesn't really apply this any more then trading anyhting would be a ponzi.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Pezroly on December 25, 2022, 02:17:08 PMP.S. I invested 0.01BTC in Tether USDT staking, it is something complete different, I always can exchange Tether USDT instantly to Bitcoin, ETH, Stelar, EOS, Ripple, Doge, TRON, Monero etc. PM for the link, if interested.If truly you have the link as you have claimed I don't see any reason why you didn't add it to your Op or perhaps you have other hidden motives as to why you want to keep the link private I just hope those are going to PM you don't get to regret it afterwards. Seeing that your thread is self-moderated I hope you ain't trying to delete any post that points out the obvious.
